think_procedure: The knob 'cpu_index_tuple_cost' is a numerical knob that sets the planner's estimate of the cost of processing each index entry during an index scan. The default value is 0.005. To determine if it's a 'special' knob, we need to check if it has any special values that would change its function or disable a feature. In this case, the description does not mention any such special values. Therefore, it is not a 'special' knob.
